name: babylonjs-editor-main
description: Babylon.js Editor is a Web Application helping artists to work with Babylon.js

scripts.postinstall: electron-rebuild -f -w node-pty -m ./node_modules/node-pty && electron-builder install-app-deps && rimraf --glob templates/**/node_modules/babylonjs-editor-tools && node ./postinstall.mjs
scripts.build: yarn build-tools && yarn build-editor && yarn build-quixel
scripts.build-all: yarn build && yarn build-templates && yarn build-website
scripts.package: yarn clean && yarn clean:node_modules && yarn && yarn lint && yarn build-all && yarn test && node build.mjs
scripts.clean: rimraf editor/build editor/declaration editor/electron-packages editor/coverage quixel/build quixel/declaration tools/build tools/declaration tools/coverage templates/nextjs/.next templates/solidjs/dist templates/vanillajs/dist website/.next
scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf editor/node_modules tools/node_modules quixel/node_modules templates/**/node_modules website/node_modules node_modules
scripts.test: yarn workspace babylonjs-editor-tools test && yarn workspace babylonjs-editor test
scripts.coverage: yarn workspace babylonjs-editor-tools coverage && yarn workspace babylonjs-editor coverage
scripts.lint: yarn format-check && concurrently "yarn lint-editor" "yarn lint-tools" "yarn lint-quixel" "yarn lint-templates" "yarn lint-website" --names editor,tools,quixel,templates,website
scripts.lint-fix: yarn format && concurrently "yarn lint-editor --fix" "yarn lint-tools --fix" "yarn lint-quixel --fix" "yarn lint-templates --fix" "yarn lint-website --fix" --names editor,tools,quixel,templates,website
